ITEM.NAME: HCATLOADER
ITEM.SHOW_IF: ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND MAPREDUCE=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND (SUBTREE_START=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: NAMENODE_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: THRIFT_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: INPUT_FILENAME
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER') OR (LOAD=='HBASESTORAGE')

PARAMETER.NAME: DATABASE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: TABLE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: PARTITION_FILTER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the execution server.

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (MAPREDUCE == 'true' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER' AND DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR=='true' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: apache-pig-without-hadoop
